mapper.select: INSERT INTO employee(employeeid, departcode, employname, loginid, loginpass, phonetic, zipcode, address1, address2, phonenum, mobilenum, email, registred, registredtime, updated, updatedtime) VALUES(#{employeeid}, #{departcode}, #{employname}, #{loginid}, #{loginpass}, #{phonetic}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{phonenum}, #{mobilenum}, #{email}, #{registred}, #{registredtime}, #{updated}, #{updatedtime})
